headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Celebrate Independence Day in GTA Online
content:
Ah, the rocketâ€™s red glare. The bombs bursting in air. The aroma of singed hot dogs mingling with gunpowder. Independence Day is in full swing around Los Santos and Blaine County this week.

An excess of patriotism means big paydays for those willing to risk it for the biscuit at high altitudes and the lowest depths, as well as deep discounts on all sorts of goodies that could only fly in these parts.
